campaign.how_to_use: How to use documents in chat
campaign.how_to_use_text:
### Using Campaign Documents in Chat

1. Upload your campaign documents (PDF, TXT, MD) using the uploader above
2. Make sure they are loaded to chat (green checkmark)
3. In the chat, you can ask questions about the documents

**Example questions:**
- "What does the rulebook say about spellcasting?"
- "Tell me about the main villain in the campaign document"
- "Summarize the key locations in the uploaded documents"

The AI will search through your documents and provide relevant information.
